last_episode_to_air.name: Tarnished Angels
last_episode_to_air.overview: As times change, the brand struggles to keep up and a stunning web-of-influence among the billionaire class is revealed; Wexner’s empire then crumbles under the weight of the Epstein allegations and a shifting cultural and fashion landscape.

name: Victoria's Secret: Angels and Demons
overview: Truth is not what it seems; as the underworld of fashion, the billionaire class, and Jeffrey Epstein are revealed to all be inextricably intertwined with the rise and fall of this legendary brand.

episodes.name: Inventing Victoria
episodes.overview: Everybody knows Victoria’s Secret, but few know the truth about the man behind it. Les Wexner, born to humble roots, manages to build a fashion empire. Along the way, he forms a close mysterious friendship with Jeffrey Epstein.

episodes.name: The Secret Friend
episodes.overview: As the Victoria’s Secret Angels become superstars and profits soar, Epstein holds a woman against her will on Wexner’s property. The brand expands to attract tween girls with PINK, while the insidious link between Wexner and Epstein goes unchecked.

episodes.name: Tarnished Angels
episodes.overview: As times change, the brand struggles to keep up and a stunning web-of-influence among the billionaire class is revealed; Wexner’s empire then crumbles under the weight of the Epstein allegations and a shifting cultural and fashion landscape.
